column5: We are leaving this Friday for Ghost River. Does anyone have a recent report water levels etc? Thanks wmd

Sorry WMD I can't help you out.I was at GRL in 2012 had a great time excellent accommodations. I will be returning next year. I would like to hear how your trip went. You can post here or feel free to PM me. Will this be your first time to GRL?MaddoggPS: When I called in July to make my reservations for next year Tena said the water was high and the tunnel to clamshell was open.
